allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Setup projeto Academia Lendária

- Adiciona DIRETRIZES-HTML.md com guia completo de design system
- Adiciona configuração do Claude Code \(.claude/\)
- Adiciona .gitignore
- Inclui páginas HTML existentes \(business.html, makers.html\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(for dir in copy data ralph squad-creator)

Bash(git -C "c:/Users/daian/Projetos/sleep_agent_Vtotal" add .claude/CLAUDE.md .claude/settings.local.json core/orquestrador/delegacao.yaml extensoes/branding/ extensoes/criador/ extensoes/customer-success/ extensoes/dados/ extensoes/educacional/ extensoes/produtos/ frameworks/ralph/templates/prd-curso.json frameworks/ralph/templates/prd-extensao.json frameworks/ralph/templates/prompt-curso.md frameworks/ralph/templates/prompt-extensao.md output/branding-design-analyst-agent/ output/criador/ output/sleep-agent-marketing/)

Bash(do sed -i 's/AIOS Framework/Sleep Agent Framework \(SAF\)/g; s/AIOS Integration/SAF Integration/g; s/AIOS Principle/SAF Principle/g; s/AIOS Quality Gates/SAF Quality Gates/g; s/AIOS Compliance/SAF Compliance/g; s/description: AIOS Quality Gates/description: SAF Quality Gates/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/author: AIOS Framework/author: Sleep Agent Framework/g; s/author: AIOS Ralph/author: Sleep Agent Ralph/g; s/aios_integration:/saf_integration:/g' "$file")

Bash(xargs -I {} sed -i 's/AIOS Framework/Sleep Agent Framework \(SAF\)/g; s/AIOS Integration/SAF Integration/g; s/AIOS Principle/SAF Principle/g; s/AIOS-FULLSTACK/SAF-FULLSTACK/g; s/maintainer: ""AIOS Pipeline""/maintainer: ""Sleep Agent Pipeline""/g; s/""author"": ""AIOS Ralph PRD Generator""/""author"": ""Sleep Agent Ralph PRD Generator""/g; s/author: AIOS Ralph/author: Sleep Agent Ralph/g; s/Part of the AIOS Expansion Pack/Part of the Sleep Agent Expansion Pack/g; s/extractor: ""AIOS extract-frameworks/extractor: ""SAF extract-frameworks/g; s/""aiosArtifacts""/""safArtifacts""/g; s/""category"": ""aios-artifacts""/""category"": ""saf-artifacts""/g; s/Follow AIOS task format/Follow SAF task format/g; s/phase1_artifacts"": ""US-001 to US-013 \(AIOS tasks/phase1_artifacts"": ""US-001 to US-013 \(SAF tasks/g; s/Create reusable AIOS artifacts/Create reusable SAF artifacts/g; s/Principios AIOS/Princípios SAF/g; s/Copy Workflows YOLO/Copy Workflows YOLO/g; s/Compatible with: AIOS-FULLSTACK/Compatible with: SAF-FULLSTACK/g; s/CopywriterOS - AIOS Expansion Pack/CopywriterOS - SAF Expansion Pack/g; s/Part of the AIOS Expansion Pack System/Part of the Sleep Agent Expansion Pack System/g; s/author: ""AIOS Copy Workflows YOLO""/author: ""Sleep Agent Copy Workflows YOLO""/g' {})
